Reference

All functions

getTMap()

Compute t-statistic map with or without Empirical Bayes.

landmarks

Estimated Landmarks for Various Imaging Modalities

maskIntersect()

Intersection of a list of brain masks

normalizeHM()

Histogram matching intensity normalization.

normalizeRAVEL()

RAVEL intensity normalization

normalizeRaw()

Create matrix of voxel intensities without normalization.

normalizeWS()

WhiteStripe intensity normalization.
